actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A resolution relating to the role of the Corps of Engineers in the management of the Missouri River System.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Congress should not impede the role of the Corps of Engineers and the affected States and other interests by considering actions to alter the management of the Missouri River System until recommendations for a change have been received from the Corps upon completion of its review or from the States along the Missouri River mainstream as a consensus recommendation.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the role of the Corps of Engineers in the management of the Missouri River System.
